name: Galentine's Night Out at F45 Branham Park
description: 45 minutes of strength training workout followed by bubbles. Free event, maximum of 30 people. Sign up by texting 'LAMOMS' to 408.549.7760.

name: Family Fun Night - Five Guys
description: Mention Los Alamitos and 25% of proceeds will be donated to the PTA.

description: Volunteers needed once per week (Tues, Wed, Thurs) to tutor students in reading skills. Training provided.
